text: Breaking Away is a 1979 American comedy drama movie. It was directed by Peter Yates. Actors include: Dennis Christopher, Dennis Quaid, Daniel Stern, Jackie Earle Haley, Paul Dooley, and Barbara Barrie. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. The movie was nominated for 5 Oscars in 1980. It won for Best Original Screenplay. An unsuccessful TV series was made in 1980. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American sports movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies about social class Category:Movies set in Indiana Category:Movies about fraternities and sororities
title: Breaking Away
